characters.name: Maya Chen-Williams
characters.description: Tall, athletic build with curly black hair in a short undercut, warm amber eyes, and a crescent moon birthmark on her right forearm.
characters.personality: Methodical, analytical, empathetic, with a dry sense of humor.
quirks: Obsessively organizes spice rack by color and usage frequency
Photographic memory for faces but forgets names
Whistles classical music when nervous
Collects unusual doorknobs
Cannot stand the texture of velvet
characters.role: Forensic archaeologist specializing in ancient cultural artifacts, working on a controversial excavation connected to her family history.

characters.name: Elijah Morales-Singh
characters.description: Stocky, powerful build with salt-and-pepper hair in a neat ponytail, weathered face, and a prominent scar across his chin.
characters.personality: Quietly confident, reliable, calm in crisis, reserved but deeply loyal.
quirks: Names every power tool in his collection
Can identify tree species by touch and smell
Keeps a one-sentence daily journal
Passionate about competitive ballroom dancing
Always carries homemade salve from grandmother's recipe
characters.role: Private Eye, retired detective and former military engineer running a community workshop for at-risk youth, concerned about ignored structural issues in a historical building.

characters.name: Dr. Zain Okonkwo
characters.description: Non-binary with slender build, close-cropped black hair with blue streak, hazel eyes, rectangular glasses, and fusion fashion style.
characters.personality: Brilliant, enthusiastically curious, optimistic, sometimes impractical, fiercely protective of friends.
quirks: Creates elaborate handshakes with friends
Takes notes on vintage index cards
Has synesthesia connecting math equations with smells
Switches between three languages when excited
Collects antique medical instruments but fears blood
characters.role: Quantum physicist with controversial theories about dimensional barriers, experiencing unexplainable experimental results.

characters.name: Sofia Tejada-Kim
characters.description: Petite but strong frame, silver-streaked black hair in a bun, expressive dark eyes, and conservative clothes with vibrant scarves.
characters.personality: Warm, maternal, shrewd, unflinchingly determined, pragmatic with a strong but flexible moral compass.
quirks: Maintains collection of international emergency numbers
Cooks complex meals without recipes but measures simple ones precisely
Speaks to plants in Korean
Carries a smooth wooden token for stress
Encyclopedic knowledge of poisonous plants and antidotes
characters.role: Respected community elder and retired intelligence operative running a bakery while helping people disappear and start new lives, now confronted by a former asset with dangerous information.

characters.name: Rafael "Rafi" Nguyen-Torres
characters.description: Lanky teenager with warm brown skin, shaggy black hair, burn scar on left shoulder and upper arm, and casual style with hand-embroidered details.
characters.personality: Sarcastic exterior protecting sensitivity, observant, passionate about justice, struggles with trust but fiercely loyal.
quirks: Creates and leaves origami figures during class
Has memorized numerous dad jokes despite disliking them
Maintains secret social media documenting urban wildlife
Follows superstitious pre-game rituals
Calculates tips instantly but pretends to struggle with math
characters.role: Gifted high school programmer who discovered patterns in seemingly random city infrastructure failures, drawing unwanted attention from powerful figures.
